featured.text: The problem is 18 when airplanes fly at higher altitudes, where the difference between the inside and outside pressure increases, causing added stress.
The town sits on the side of a volcano nearly 10,000 feet above sea level, making daily life a kind of high-altitude training.

definition.zh_def: 高度，特別是指地面或海平面以上的垂直距離。
definition.en_def: The height of an object or point in relation to sea level or ground level.
definition.example: The airplane reached an altitude of 30,000 feet.
